name: comparing
description: Create a comparison function to be used for sorting arrays.

scripts.clean: rimraf index.js index.mjs index.d.ts index.iife.min.js es coverage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:iife && npm test
scripts.build:es: tsc -p . -m es2015 --outDir es && node -e "require('fs').renameSync('es/index.js','index.mjs')" && rimraf es
scripts.build:iife: rollup -i index.mjs -f iife -n comparing | uglifyjs -m -c join_vars=true -o index.iife.min.js
